title: US Citizenship Test 2020
description:
With this free US Citizenship Test App (2019 edition) you can prepare for the US citizenship final interview.
INCLUDING
- Reading Test
- Writing Test
- Civics Test
There are 100 civics questions on the naturalization test. During the naturalization interview, applicants will be asked up to 10 questions from the list of 100 questions. In order to become a US citizen you will need to answer at least six questions correctly.
The questions cover knowledge of the American Government (Principles of American Democracy, Systems of Government, Rights and Responsibilities), American History (Colonial Period and Independence, 1800s, Recent American History and Other Important Historical Information) and about Integrated Civics (Geography, Symbols, Holidays).
This
high-quality app helps you to prepare for the actual UCSIS Civics test
. The questions are based on USCIS latest prep document.
The statistics page shows how many test you did and how you've done so far. All this makes learning for your US naturalization test fun and challenging!
FEATURES
* STUDY MODE: choose what you want to study
* TEST MODE: 10 random questions
* Flashcards
* bookmark questions
* sound on/off option
* timer on/off option
* showing/hiding correct answer
* statistic analysis with bar graphs
NEW
INCLUDES the following state questions:
- Name your U.S. Representative. (Answers will vary.)
- Who is one of your state’s U.S. Senators now? (Answers will vary)
- Who is the Governor of your state now? (Answers will vary.)
- What is the capital of your state? (Answers will vary.)
If you have any issues or want to leave a feedback, please to not hesitate to contact us. Thanks.
